charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 2252(a)(4)(B)  POSSESSION OF MATERIAL DEPICTING THE SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF A MINOR(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 6 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the Defendant shall be on Supervised Release for a term of 10 years. As a condition of supervised release, the Defendant shall serve 12 months of home confinement, with electronic monitoring. Said term of supervised release comes with standard and special conditions of supervision, as more fully stated in said Judgment. A Special Assessment of $100 is to be paid to the U.S. District Court Clerk forthwith.
